alternative_title: Employer's tax and reporting for cash prizes in employer-run competitions
body:
$!Cash prizes for any competitions you run that are only open to your employees count as earnings. As an employer, you don’t need to report these payments to HMRC.$!

You will need to:

- add the amount to your employee's other earnings
- deduct and pay PAYE tax and Class 1 National Insurance through payroll

*[PAYE]:Pay As You Earn
overview: Tax and reporting rules for employers running cash prize competitions for employees
title: Expenses and benefits: cash prizes for employer-run competitions
